title: A Designer’s New Coastal Home For Multigenerational Living
description: When Kristiina Reeve’s parents decided they wanted to live near their daughter and her young family, it kickstarted the new build of two side by side houses on her existing Mount Martha site. The house you see here is Kristiina’s, who personally designed the home as the co-founder of interior design studio Mékr Studio. Leaning on natural and layered materials, she shares how she created a new abode with an already lived-in feel.
author: The Design Files
